alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Flagler, Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Beverly Hills to 7 miles southwest of DeLeon Springs. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Citra, Lynne, Sparr, Anthony and Ocklawaha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
